aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-2239-798 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Instrument display flickering. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 21/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 24/01/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 25/01/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 28/01/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 31/01/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: NFF - No Failure Found
